## Description {#details}

A recipe for handling first-order recurrence phis.

The start value is the first operand of the recipe and the incoming value from the backedge is the second operand.

Definition at line 2352 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
